1�Ah, the dark knight...It's been twenty years since we last met, Zeid.
1�I cannot die. Not until I have eradicated you and your kind from this world.
1�Thirty years ago, I was in a group that came to this cursed land, seeking to uncover the secrets of a lost civilization.
1�And it is here that I fell, betrayed by one I trusted with my life.
1�My friend Ulrich could not abide the fact that I was the best swordsman of the Mythril Musketeers. That I was advocating peace with the beastmen at the time was not to his liking, either.
1�Cornelia died protecting me...
1�But I came back. Not even death could keep me from exacting revenge on those who wronged me.
1�A power hidden deep beneath the earth gave me a new form and granted me control over the nether beasts.
1�It was then that I became aware--that I was made aware--of the dark anger smoldering deep within my soul.
1�I realized it was not revenge that drove me, but the old, undying anger of our race: the wrath of the Galka!
1�Others cannot fathom the depth of our rage.But I cast myself willingly into its flames, and broke the chains of mortality!
1�Your kind awoke the fury within me, and I was reborn into rage incarnate--as the Shadow Lord!
1�I swore to myself then to purge this world of your kind, and I will not rest until I crush every last one of you!
4�I underestimated you twenty years ago, but I will not make that mistake again!
1�Stand there and watch, Zeid. Search within for the dark rage, the flame that burns in the souls of all Galka!
1�Now...I will cleanse this world of your filth, unless I am first consumed by fury!
1�Come, it is the hour of reckoning! Death itself failed to stay my wrath. Let us see if you can do any better!
1�No...it is not over yet! I told you, even death cannot stop my revenge!
1�I will not fall! I will keep coming back, until the fires of wrath consume me!
1�??Rao...grimm???
1�No, that is not my name! I am... I am the Shadow Lord!
1�I am...Rao...Raogrimm!? Aaargh!
1�Could this be...
1�Yes, it is the tomb of the Shadow Lord!
1�No! How is this possible? I defeated you!
1�So it is true... I suspected as much since we last met. You are a Galka!
4�What!? No!
1�Raogrimm, stop! Listen to me, it is over!
1�You are no such thing! Search your memories for your true self! You are Raogrimm, the Galka's greatest swordsman!
1�Do you remember?
1�Raogrimm, it is good to have you back. How has all this come to be?
1�Raogrimm...
1�I, too, feel that our paths may cross again. Until then, I wish you farewell.
1�So, Volker is not with you...
1�No matter how many of the Kindred are slain, the darkness that engulfs Bastok will remain until the past that haunts him is vanquished.
1�The enemy lies within me.Raogrimm stood up to rid himself of what plagued him. Now it is time for Volker to do the same.
1�Take up your weapon...I will not let Raogrimm's death be in vain. Where there is light, there is pain for Bastok...
1�And now one of us must journey to the dark to wake those that still dwell in the light.
1�Let the sound of our blades ring forth to Gustaberg...and to Volker's ears. You need not hold back. I am prepared to face whatever may come.
1�Is this the extent of your power? Why do you hesitate?
1�This will not appease...
1�Volker...
1�Wait? I've waited twenty years...
1�I will answer your question with another. What has brought you here, Volker?
1�How dare you!You vehemently deny that your success has been a result of your uncle's deeds; however, when you learn of the crime he has committed, you are at a loss for words.
1�Do not mock me!Do you not realize!? You are just another page in the bloody history of the Talekeeper!
1�And if you cannot find within that pain the answers that you seek, then learn from my blade the true meaning of your pitiful existence!
1�From this point, twenty years ago, our lives took different paths... And this is where those paths are to end!
1�You have become quite...a warrior, Volker.
1�You finally see...You do not need to fight alone. Others will always be there to...
1�Twenty years ago, when my blade met that of the Shadow Lord, I felt his anguish... That anguish forced me into the shadows.
1�However, there I did not find what I sought. It was only then that I realized the answer lay in the light.
1�While it is my destiny to remain trapped in the darkness of my soul, yours is not. Your place is out in the light. And that is why Bastok is better in your hands than mine.
1�They only await my return because they do not have faith in yours. Look behind you, Volker. Look at the worry on their faces. Listen to the story those faces tell.
1�The age of adventurers...It is an age without heroes, as well as an age where anyone can become one.
1�An age such as this requires a strong leader to help the people overcome their troubling pasts. You are best suited for that position.
1�You are the only one who can.
1�I...I will now return to the shadows. I look forward to seeing how our country prospers under its leaders.
1�If I were to return now, I would destroy everything Gumbah has attempted to build.
1�The time for conflict between the Galka and the Humes is over. I ask you to support Gumbah in his efforts in bringing our people together.
1�Hmph. I accept your challenge, but on one condition--that you don't hold back like you did this time.
1�Yes... I do now.
1�As you know, I was the Talekeeper of the Galka--the keeper of our race's memories. But there was so much pain, so much anger...
1�I let myself become trapped in a dark abyss of swirling rage and madness...
1�People are capable of kindness beyond angels, yet we also commit sins that would put a demon to shame...
1�We all stand precariously on the edge between darkness and light... And when we fall, we are greeted by only madness and chaos.
1�And so I have fallen...
1�There is no salvation for me. The Raogrimm whom you once knew is gone, forever.
1�I expect no forgiveness for what I have done, but...
1�My true self died thirty years ago... All that remains is an empty shell...
1�Cornelia... Finally, we may meet again...
1�Come on! This way, hurry!

4
�So...I guess this is goodbye for now.I hear they've started flights to the Outlands. If you ever get your hands on 6????, come see me in Norg sometime.
1�I'll be seeing you,  . Bye!
1�I apologize for making you wait.
1�I want some answers, Zeid. Why are you doing this?
1�Why do you have to play these games? If you want my position so badly, why don't you just come back to Bastok and take it? It's yours!
1�You... How can you know the pain that I feel!?
1�If it is our destiny, then so be it...
1�Zeid!
1�It is only because this adventurer was with me. Alone, I could not have defeated you...
1�What are you saying? Don't you realize how many people out there are waiting for your return?
1�Why are you...
1�But can I truly lead them...?
1�Zeid...When I have fulfilled my duties...I wish another round with you.
1�I'm sorry you had to see that.
1�I should head back to the President's Office now. I have a lot of explaining to do...We will be waiting for you as well,  .
1�Captain!It's not fair! Why didn't you tell us you were coming?
1�I would have given anything to go a few rounds with the legendary dark knight!
1�But if we only had something to pummel...
1�And you wonder why you are still a doorboy...
1�It is ironic, but it is our duty to create a society where people like Naji are forced to complain about ??having nothing to pummel.??
1�Our purpose is not to merely improve our skills as fighters, but to protect and ensure the happiness of the citizens of the Republic. We bring them hope.
1�Sir! The Galka still await your...
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Rank 5 Mission(pt.1).The Rank 5 Mission(pt.2).The Rank 5 Mission(pt.3).The Rank 5 Mission(pt.4).Where Two Paths Converge(pt.1).Where Two Paths Converge(pt.2).Where Two Paths Converge(pt.3).Survival of the Wisest(pt.1).Survival of the Wisest(pt.2).Survival of the Wisest(pt.3).Smash! A Malevolent Menace(pt.1).Smash! A Malevolent Menace(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�Now, listen close...
1�And so the Shadow Lord was defeated,thanks to  's selfless courage and sacrifice.
4�Through the clouds shines a symbol ofnewfound hope for the peoples of Vana'diel.But none should forget that wherever thereis light, there is always shadow.

4
�The legend goes on to say...From the darkest depths of the earththe Warriors of the Crystal rose...
1�Your tardiness is unacceptable,  .It is not a pupil's place to keep ?[his/her] teacher waiting.
1�Haha, I only jest. I am well aware of the difficulties which may arise in the procuring of  $????.I assume that is what delayed you.
1�Unfortunately, I am afraid your trials have not come to a close just yet.The true test is now upon you.
1�You will not require a pen and ink for this test.Shall we begin, then?

1�I gather your twenty-some-odd years of study must have taught you something of import.You are no doubt by now familiar with the ethos of our school, yes? "To know is to act,"  .Come, then! And show me what you think you know!
r!�I'm here! Let the games begin!
r!�I'm here! Let the games begin!
1�Surely you weren't going to walk off with all the prizes yourself, kupo?
1�But how odd... Where are all the games!?The chocobo shoe toss! The Whack-a-Mole-Crab!Wherever is the Mega Mog Bonanza-Rama-Pamama!?
1�Kupo?
1�I have a bad feeling about this...
r.�Toto! What's the meaning of this, kupo!?Where are the games you promised!?
..�R-Riko!?
1�Wh-what's the meaning of this?What are you doing here, kupo!?
1�Riko! I should have known you were the one behind this shady scam!
1�It was far too conniving for that cerebrally challenged Toto to have hatched all by himself, kupo!
1�I-is that...a giant...c-c-crystal!?...In his stomach, kupo?
o!�Phew, kupo. This time we've really resolved things once and for all!
1�It wasn't easy, but you know what they say.??That which doesn't send your Mog House crashing down into a heap only makes its foundation stronger, kupo!??
1�Thanks to Riko and Toto's hijinks, I've come to realize more than ever just how fortunate I am to have a master like you!Promise me that we'll remain the most faithful of friends forever, kupo!
1�Yeah!With me as your Chief Expectorative Officer!
1�With your money and my brains...we'll be unstoppable!
1�Wh-what!?
1�Y-you can't do this to me!I'm a Kupeliaure!

o.�Oh, h-h-hullo there. Well, it seems this whole per-dicament has been un-complificated.U-u-um... Dad should be b-b-back from vacation soon, and I'll t-tell him you've been model tenets in his obsolescence.
1�I've swindled many a sucker in my day, but to think you'd fall for this festival flimflam...
1�Ya still don't get it, do ya?
1�Uncle Riko gave ya the perfect opportunity to end this quick-and-easy, like.But ya just hadta play the hero, didn't ya?
1�I was hoping it wouldn't come ta this. Disposin' of bodies--even puny ones like yours--ain't cheap, ya know.But hey, that's the way the cinna-cookie crumbles.
1�Listen up, you no-good moochers.
1�You've gotten away with yer rent-free Mog Houses for long enough.
1�Ya want repairs and renovations? A penthouse suite with a Ru'Lude Gardens view?
1�Fine, here's the deal.And before ya ask, this one ain't negotiable.
1�First, we tear up each and every one of those sorry shacks you call Mog Houses.
1�In their place, we put up luxury apartments with all the modern accoutrements. Glorious, massive Mog Towers reaching high into the clouds!
1�But here's the kicker: no more free rides for you freeloading adventurers.I'll cater to only the richest of the rich--fat cats and bigwigs with the loosest of purse-strings!
1�Since you two seem so eager, I've already decided to start with your place...
1�Hm. Ya ain't looking too happy 'bout this. But that's no biggie.'Cause the two of you are gonna be movin' out, ya see?...Permanently, like.
1�No more skulking in the shadows for me.Soon, all of Vana'diel will know the name of Riko Kupenreich, mog estate tycoon!Bwahahahahahaha!
1�Don't think so, kid.See, I've got you pegged for an early retirement.
1�Enough! ...Behold!
1�Look upon this majestic, multifaceted jewel!See it shimmer with the light of innumerable galaxies!
n!�Wh-what the--!?Whowhatwherewhenwhyhow--!?
1�I'm not sure what just happened, but I appear to be back to my senses!
1�It would seem I owe the two of you a debt of gratitude, kupo.
y!�...Free of charge, of course, kupo!
1�And with that, I'm off!
1�After all, the business world waits for no moogle, kupo!
1�Oh, and don't worry. That loan contract I wrote up for you was just random scribbles on a scrap of parchment.
1�I would suggest that you stay out of debt in the future, kupo.Live within your means and all. As the old proverb goes, a frugal moogle is a happy moogle!
1�Allow me, though, to present you with one last luxury...the Crystal Prize in our regrettably canceled Mega Mog Bonanza-Rama-Palooza, kupo!
1�Consider it an apology for this whole hullabaloo, and a token of enduring goodwill between adventurers and mooglekind, kupo!

1�To tell you the truth, Uncle Riko's been doing a lot of thinking these past few minutes.Why, I believe I'll give up my moneylending operation and devote the rest of my life to charity.Rent-free shelters for orphans! Food kitchens serving piping hot turtle soup to the poor!
1�Maybe you can join yer old man on his cruise... I hear Mount Zhayolm is beautiful this time of year.
1�Even a half-wit dunce knows magicite when he sees it.
1�Hehhehheh...I know just what you're thinking.
1�??Uncle Riko stumbled onto some weird crystal, and got himself possessed by another supernatural force,?? eh?
1�Hah! I pity your lack of vision!
1�For I, truly, am the Moogle to End All Moogles!The Alpha and the Omega!The Keeper of the Kupocalypse!

s!�Millennia of indentured servitude... Of our noble race being used, abused, and taken for granted by self-absorbed adventurers like you...The injustice has burned a hole in the belly of the very fabric of my being!
1�Seething flames of agony rage deep within my moogle soul!Flames that can only be quelled by...yes! Your complete and utter destruction!
